inputs.name: targetType
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target script type: File Path or Inline

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script to execute. Must be a fully qualified path or relative to $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory).

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments passed to the PowerShell script. Either ordinal parameters or named parameters.

inputs.name: script
inputs.label: Script
inputs.defaultValue:
# Write your commands here

# Use the environment variables input below to pass secret variables to this script

inputs.name: failOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.

messages.JS_InvalidErrorActionPreference: Invalid ErrorActionPreference '%s'. The value must be one of: 'Stop', 'Continue', or 'SilentlyContinue'
messages.JS_InvalidFilePath: Invalid file path '%s'. A path to a .ps1 file is required.
messages.JS_Stderr: PowerShell wrote one or more lines to the standard error stream.
messages.PS_InvalidErrorActionPreference: Invalid ErrorActionPreference '{0}'. The value must be one of: 'Stop', 'Continue', or 'SilentlyContinue'
messages.PS_InvalidFilePath: Invalid file path '{0}'. A path to a .ps1 file is required.
messages.PS_UnableToDetermineExitCode: Unexpected exception. Unable to determine the exit code from powershell.
